triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 是虚幻引擎中用于执行碰撞追踪的功能，帮助开发者检测物体间的碰撞

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 通常需要在每帧执行，因此依赖 Event Tick 节点来触发

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 使用 First Person Camera 的位置和旋转作为追踪的起点和方向

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 执行后会生成 Hit Result，包含命中的物体信息

triples.subject: Hit Result
triples.context: Hit Result 包含 Hit Actor，表示被追踪命中的物体

triples.subject: First Person Camera
triples.context: First Person Camera 提供 World Location，用于确定追踪的起点

triples.subject: First Person Camera
triples.context: First Person Camera 提供 World Rotation，用于确定追踪的方向

triples.subject: World Rotation
triples.context: World Rotation 可以通过 Get Forward Vector 节点转换为 Forward Vector，用于确定追踪方向

triples.subject: Forward Vector
triples.context: Forward Vector 可以通过乘以一个浮点数（如1500）来扩展为追踪的长度

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 支持通过设置 Draw Debug Type 来显示调试线，帮助开发者可视化追踪过程

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 可以替代 Line Trace By Object，后者专门用于追踪特定的 ObjectTypes

triples.subject: Line Trace By Channel
triples.context: Line Trace By Channel 适用于游戏中的物理交互，如射击、碰撞检测等

triples.subject: Blueprint First Person
triples.context: Blueprint First Person 模板包含 BP_FirstPersonCharacter 蓝图，是设置 Line Trace By Channel 的基础

triples.subject: BP_FirstPersonCharacter
triples.context: BP_FirstPersonCharacter 使用 First Person Camera 组件作为玩家视角
